boat.name: PIXIE
boat.bt_comment:
KEY FEATURES
1) Jacuzzi on Deck
2) Full teak deck & hard top (sail)
3) Newly built
4) Massive fly bridge with two large sunbathing beds at the aft
5) Hydraulic swimming platform
6) Galley is located in the lower deck

boat.name: MYRA
boat.bt_comment: The sailing schooner Myra was designed and built by Turkish Ege Yat yacht builders in 2003, the yacht received a reﬁt in 2010, 2013 and 2016. Now in winter 2020 she is under serious and complete refit, aesthetic, mechanical and plant engineering. In 2021 she will be like brand new boat. Myra has a traditional vibe about her. The exterior steel hull is painted deep rich black, her bulwarks are high gloss varnish and the deck is in classic teak. The interior is spacious and warm boasting ﬁne woods panels and teak and holly inlay floors. Aboard Myra, the salon is in the raised deck house, large ports allow ample natural light and great viewing. On the port side 2 formal dining tables seat all 12 guests with room to spare, on the starboard side a built in lounge and coffee table invite guests to relax in comfort. A flat screen TV and audio system is available for indoor entertainment. Four double guest cabins are forward of the salon, while 2 twin guests cabins are aft of the salon. The aft deck offers an alfresco dining option, seating and aft facing sunpads, shade from a Bimini cover can be provided. Further sunpads on the foredeck allow everyone to ﬁnd a place to relax. Myra boasts generous wrap around teaks decks, with high rails, the yacht is easy to walk around safely both at anchor and under sail.

ChristAl MiO combines all the strengths of a power catamaran with Fountaine Pajot’s extensive experience producing award-winning motor yacht and luxury catamarans.
